name: Low Groove Serving Bowl in Orange and White
description:
Beautiful hand thrown porcelain bowl accented with hand carved horizontal "grooves" on the exterior top and a smooth band glazed in a glossy orange. The grooved portion has a naked, unglazed finish that perfectly enhances the tactile quality of the piece and provides a nice contrast to the smooth orange surface. The interior is glazed in a bright, glossy white.

Measures approximately 3"H x 10"W. Makes a great serving bowl as well as a nice fruit bowl for your countertop. Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly. 

*******

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

name: Short Pebble Vase in Red
description:
Beautiful hand-thrown porcelain vase hand glazed in a satin red color and accented with a pebble inspired slip design in white. The design is comprised of individually applied slip dots which are slightly raised above the surface. This gives the piece a wonderful, tactile texture and sculptural appearance.

The interior of the vessel is sealed with a glossy glaze while the exterior has a sophisticated satin matte finish. Measures approximately 6"H x 5"W. Makes a very eye catching display piece as well as a beautiful container for a single shorter stemmed flower. Water-tight. 

*********

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

name: Tilt Serving Bowl in Mint Green
description:
Beautiful hand-thrown porcelain bowl with a hand altered asymmetrical rim. The interior is covered in mint green while the outside and rim have a glossy clear finish for a nice contrast and compliment to the design.

Measures approximately 10.5”W x 4”H and holds about 6 cups. Makes a great serving bowl as well as a nice fruit bowl for your countertop. Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly. 

*******

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

name: Whirl Serving Dish
description:
A piece of functional sculpture for your next dinner party!

This beautiful hand thrown and altered porcelain serving plate is part of a collection that I designed and created called Whirls. It was made from one hand thrown vessel and altered to enhance its functionality as well as to create a beautiful, visually interesting piece. I make each Whirl myself, completely by hand in my New York studio.

It has a glossy clear finish with the white of the clay showing through. Measures approximately 10"W x 2.25"H. This one is extra deep, so it's great for filling with your favorite nibbles. The cupped portion is completely sealed, so it’s great for dip, hummus or salsa. Use it, then display it as an art piece. Food and dishwasher safe, though hand-washing is best. Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly.

*******
Each Whirl is made one at a time, completely by hand so each one is a unique, heirloom quality piece. The Whirl pictured is the Whirl that you will receive.
*******

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

NEW!

Beautiful hand-thrown porcelain serving bowl glazed in a colorful orange and red combination with a white strip in the center. 

Measures approximately 8.75"W x 3"H. A fun, beautiful bowl for serving.

* Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly. Food and dishwasher safe. 

I will combine shipping on the purchase of multiple items. Please contact me with your shipping info for a quote.

name: Short Colorblock Vase in Olive Green and Matte Warm Grey
description:
Beautiful hand thrown porcelain vase glazed in a glossy olive green with a band of matte warm grey on the bottom. The warm grey surface has an almost stone-like finish which perfectly compliments the glossy green and gives the piece a really unique look. 

Measures approximately 4.25"H x 5.25"W. Its shape and color makes it a great display piece, though it also looks great when filled with a bunch of full, short stemmed flowers. Would also make a nice planter. Shown with other vases from this series which are sold separately.

********

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

name: Conversation Piece in White No. 1 - Sculpture in White
description:
NEW!

From a series of thrown and altered sculptures comes this unique, one of a kind porcelain vessel. It was hand formed into a gentle tilt with a sloping curve which gives the piece an interesting gestural quality.Both the interior and exterior are covered in a soft, glossy white glaze. 

It measures approximately 7.75"H x 5" at its widest point. It is not water-tight. 

* Please note - this is a sculptural vessel and is not water-tight. It is meant to be a decorative object only. Also, due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly.

As with all my work, this vase was handmade from start to finish without any molds or casts in my New York City studio.

*******

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

name: Large Circle Serving Bowl in Orange
description:
Hand-thrown porcelain bowl hand glazed in a brilliant orange color and accented with a super mod circle slip design in white. The design is comprised of individually applied slip dots that are slightly raised above the surface. This gives the bowl a nice, tactile quality and interesting visual texture.

The inside of the piece is covered in a glossy clear glaze, it measures approximately 9.5”W x 4.25”H and generously holds about 8 cups. Its unique appearance makes it a real statement piece and would work beautifully as a fruit bowl for your counter top. Also a great size for a large serving bowl.

Food and dishwasher safe. Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary.

******

Measures approximately 3.5”H x 5.75"W (including the handle) and holds about 15 oz. Very comfortable to hold and fits nicely in my hands. Food and dishwasher safe. Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly.

name: Large Sweet Pea
description:
One super cute hand-thrown porcelain vessel accented with a pebble inspired surface design in white. The pebble design is comprised of individually applied slip dots that are slightly raised above the surface. This gives the exterior a nice, tactile quality.

The exterior of the vessel is unglazed and the interior is coated in either orange, red, green or yellow for a nice pop of color. Makes a great display piece for your desk or shelf and pairs especially well with other Sweet Peas and Pebble bottles.

Large size measures approximately 5”W x 3”H with a 2.5"W opening and is water-tight. Please note that due to monitor differences, colors may vary slightly. Price is for one sweet pea.

Want to see how these are made? Check out my mini process documentary:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UicyAYZrnRo&fmt=18

****************************************************

Items shipped to a New York address will be charged 8.875% sales tax.

name: Pebble Cups

Reg. $34
